pkgmetadata.longdescription: # anime-episode-parsertry parse episode info from title```bashpoetry add anime_episode_parser``````pythonfrom anime_episode_parser import parse_episodetitle = '[YMDR][哥布林殺手][Goblin Slayer][2018][05][1080p][AVC][JAP][BIG5][MP4-AAC][繁中]'assert (5, 1) == parse_episode(title)# 5 for episode start# 1 for episodes counttitle = '[从零开始的异世界生活 第二季_Re Zero S2][34-35][繁体][720P][MP4]'assert (34, 2) == parse_episode(title)# 34 for episode start# 2 for episodes counttitle = "something can't parse"assert (None, None) == parse_episode(title)```
